main.name: Hi, I'm Mihretab
main.description: I am an upcoming software developer with strong communication, interpersonal, organizational, time management, analytical and solution-oriented skills. I use JS' react, and bootstrap framework to develop the web frontend. Also MERN stack for backend and functional web apps.
main.bio: I'm Mihretab, trying to become a fullstack developer. I am comfortable with JavaScript and it's frameworks & libraries like NodeJS, React and Express. I've a strong background in Artificial Intelligence, Mobile app development, Web App development, embedded systems and Networking
